name: Transition Pathways
description: JVS helps youth build bridges to postsecondary education and careers in three industries: early care and education, building construction trades, and environmental technology.

whatTheyOffer: JVS helps youth build bridges to postsecondary education and careers in three industries: early care and education, building construction trades, and environmental technology.
howToGetIt: Call mainline or email for more information.
